name: The Old Man with the Canaries

description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Weapon

Standard

+41 vs AC; 1d12+20 damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Standard, Uses One Canary

Area burst 1 within 30, centered on ally

+41 vs AC; the target is stunned (save ends). Effect: The ally in the origin square gains fly 10 until the end of its next turn.

Summoning

Standard, Uses One Canary

Ranged 20

Bahamut summons a Large gold dragon in an unoccupied space within range. The dragon has speed 8, fly 10 (hover) and, unlike a typical summoned creature, has its own defenses and hit points (all defenses 34; hp 120).

Minor Action: +27 vs. AC; 1d12 + 10 damage.

Opportunity Attack: +27 vs. AC; 1d12 + 10 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Two targets

Ranged 30; each target gains a +10 bonus to attack rolls, a +10 bonus to skill checks, and a +10 bonus to damage rolls until the end of the target's next turn

At-Will

Minor

Two targets

Ranged 30; each target can end one effect a save can end.

At-Will âœ¦ Healing

Minor

Two targets

Ranged 30; each target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 25 hit points.

Encounter âœ¦ Polymorph

Standard

Bahamut assumes his draconic form (see Bahamut).
Bahamut has seven trained canaries, which he can transform into gold dragons. Some of his powers use up these canaries. All the canaries return during a short rest.

Trigger: When bloodied

When Bahamut becomes bloodied, he discorporates and is unable to take physical form for a time.

system.biography:
HP 1645; Bloodied 822 ; see also discorporation
Resist 20 cold, 20 fire 		Init +24 | AP 2 | Save +5; whenever an attack causes an effect on Bahamut that a save can end, he immediately makes a saving throw. Bahamut also makes saving throws at the end of his turn as normal.
AC 52Fort 47Ref 45Will 47
Speed 8, teleport 5
Ability ScoresStr 31 (+28)
Con 33 (+29)		Dex 23 (+24)
Int 27 (+26)		Wis 28 (+27)
Cha 29 (+27)
Languages Supernal
Alignment Lawful Good
Skills Arcana +31, Athletics +33, Diplomacy +32, Endurance +34, Heal +32, History +31, Insight +32, Intimidate +32, Religion +31Senses
Passive Perception 37 | Insight 42

Equipment robe
